name: r-api
description: Interface with your R1 remotely via wss and a rest api

scripts.build-creation: cd creation-react && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-control-panel: cd r1-control-panel && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-all: npm run build-creation && npm run build-control-panel
scripts.test: npm run test-blacklist && npm run test-server

author: AidanTheBandit
